main event: A housewife observed a red and green flashing light in the eastern sky for 30 minutes on February 10, 1957.
interesting points: The object changed from red and green flashing lights to a dim white light before fading out., The visibility of the object was at an estimated 40 degrees elevation., The report suggests the sighting was probably a balloon., A star chart indicated the presence of the bright star Arcturus in the vicinity., The sighting was confirmed as ground visual observation.
